item.title: Publish handler
item.description:
To handle a MQTT publisher, create a handler class which implements the org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback interface and is annotated with @MqttPublishHandler. This annotation takes the following parameter:

  • The clients parameter specifying the client that will publish the messages.

With this class, the default reconnection behavior can be overridden.
